sections.name: Activity Indicator
sections.description: A view that shows that a task is in progress.

sections.name: Skeleton
sections.description: While the processes are working, usually developers place a loading view to show users that something is going on and prepare them for which contents are waiting.

sections.name: Action Sheet
sections.description: An action sheet is a specific style of alert that presents two or more choices related to the current context.

sections.name: Alert
sections.description: Alerts convey important information related to the state of your app or the device, and often request feedback.

sections.name: Animation
sections.description: List of animations.

sections.name: Effects
sections.description: List of ready-use effects.

sections.name: Transition
sections.description: List of animation transitions.

sections.name: Calendar
sections.description: List of components and ready-use calendars.

sections.name: Cards
sections.description: List of cards.

sections.name: Control
sections.description: Visual elements that convey a specific action or intention in response to user interactions.

sections.name: Button
sections.description: A control that executes your custom code in response to user interactions.

sections.name: Segment Control
sections.description: A control that consists of multiple segments, each segment functioning as a discrete button.

sections.name: Slider
sections.description: A control for selecting a single value from a continuous range of values.

sections.name: Switch
sections.description: A control that offers a binary choice, such as on/off.

sections.name: Text Field
sections.description: An object that displays an editable text area in your interface.

sections.name: Text View
sections.description: A scrollable, multiline text region.

sections.name: Collection View
sections.description: An object that manages an ordered collection of data items and presents them using customizable layouts.

sections.name: Layout
sections.description: An object that manages an ordered collection of data items and presents them using customizable layouts.

sections.name: Controller
sections.description: An object that manages a view hierarchy for your UIKit app.

sections.name: Messages
sections.description: Replicate messages controller with message views.

sections.label: label
sections.name: Label
sections.description: A view that displays one or more lines of informational text.

sections.name: Menu
sections.description: List of menus.

sections.name: Progress Indicator
sections.description: A view that depicts the progress of a task over time.

sections.name: Tab Bar
sections.description: A control that displays one or more buttons in a tab bar for selecting between different subtasks, views, or modes in an app.

sections.name: Table View
sections.description: A view that presents data using rows in a single column.
